reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Emergency response to combat dengue fever in Aden Governorate and its directorates.

description.narrative: 1- (861,719) beneficiaries obtained a safe environment from which to live by reducing the spread of the dengue fever epidemic in all directorates of Aden Governorate. 2- Reducing the death rate resulting from the outbreak of dengue fever 3- Suction of stagnant water and water swamps in all directorates of Aden governorate at a rate of 48 operations per district.
1- Contribute to reducing the breeding sources of mosquitoes that transmit dengue fever. 2- Contribute to reducing deaths resulting from the spread of dengue fever.
Implementing pesticide spraying campaigns to combat dengue fever and suction stagnant water and swamps to provide a healthy environment in Aden Governorate and its districts.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
